content: > enjoy 15 % off this pattern for its release by entering code pao until february 1 pao is a loose-fitting jacket with a wide shawl collar and puff sleeves its original construction is mm us size 11 80 cm 32″ minimum for magic loop method circular needle adjust needle size if necessary to obtain the correct gauge **notions** stitch markers stitch holders or waste yarn tapestry needle **gauge** 12 sts and 18 row = 10 cm 4″ in 2x2 ribbing after blocking to save time take time to check gauge **construction** the pao jacket has an original sideways construction for the upper body which is worked from center back down to the cuffs stitches are cast-on for the right back and shawl collar which are worked in one piece until the back collar is complete the collar is then worked separately for several row until enough length has been established in order to pick up sts along its edge for the front the right front and back are worked flat until they are joined at the underarm for the sleeve worked in the round a large amount of decreases is worked at the cuff in order to gather the fabric for the puff sleeve the left upper body and sleeve is worked in the same manner by picking up stitches along the right back and shawl collar cast-on finally sts are picked up along the edge of the upper body for the lower body which has some shaping and is worked flat down to the lower edge in 2x2 ribbing --------------------------------- > profitez de 15 % de réduction sur le patron pour sa sortie en utilisant le code pao jusqu au 1er février pao est une veste loose
